# Unity-generated folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/

# Crash and debug logs
sysinfo.txt
*.stacktrace

# User-specific files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Rider / JetBrains IDE
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# VS Code
.vscode/

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity Asset meta files (optional - use with caution)
# *.meta

# Auto-generated VS/MonoDevelop files
ExportedObj/
.consulo/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

.collab/

.plastic/

*.cloud
